name: 國際行銷管理
description: 在地球村的概念下，行銷產品/服務至全世界是全球品牌的目標。本課程將為未來有機會服務於全球或多國企業的同學們提供堅實的訓練內容。過去曾經修習過行銷管理課程的同學可修習這門課作為進階課程。在基本行銷管理概念之上，本課程提供全球行銷管理的特定知識；瞭解在單一與全球市場進行行銷活動的差異。
goals: 同學會瞭解多國企業不同的管理導向、發展全球行銷策略的方法，以及策略之彈性與限制。
同學會學習在全球市場環境下如何發展有效的行銷計畫。經由課程活動的訓練，同學們能習得全球行銷規劃的能力，並增進其分析、問題解決與溝通的能力

syllabus:
Week 1: Syllabus Review and Introduction to Global Marketing Management

Week 2: Global Marketing Environments: Economic, Financial, and Political Issues

Week 3: Global Cultural Environment and Buying Behavior

Week 4: Global Segmentation and Positioning

Week 5: 10/8 The official leave of the lecturer (no class)

Week 6: Global Marketing Strategies

Week 7: Market Research

Week 8: Global Market Entry Strategies & Product & Market Development

Week 9: Mid-term Exam week (no class)

Week 10: Midterm exam in the class

Week 11: Global Logistics and Distribution

Week 12: Communicating With the World Consumer

Week 13:Guest speech 9:30am-11.30am

Guest speaker: Associate Professor Dr Shane Mathews (QUT Business School, QUT)

Speech topic: The Internets impact on international sales management

Week 14: Marketing in Emerging Market

Week 15: Oral Presentation I

Week 16: Oral Presentation II

Week 17: Oral Presentation III

Week 18: Final Exam (no class)
